thread.title: U.S. attorney to step up federal illegal gun prosecutions
thread.title_full: U.S. attorney to step up federal illegal gun prosecutions - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: Written by: FOX8Live.com Staff
title: U.S. attorney to step up federal illegal gun prosecutions
text:
NEW ORLEANS, LA (WVUE) - The U.S. attorney said Wednesday that his office is stepping up federal illegal gun prosecutions in the New Orleans area.
In conjunction with the ATF and NOPD, the office is enhancing federal prosecution of convicted felons in possession of firearms; individuals subject to domestic violence orders who are in possession of firearms; and anyone who possesses illegal firearms in or near elementary and secondary schools.
U.S. Attorney Kenneth Polite said those prosecuted for these offenses will face significant jail time and his office will lobby against bail in most cases.
"This initiative will bring needed federal resources to those areas of New Orleans and our region where we see the highest levels of gun violence on a day-to-day basis,” Polite said in a news release. “In particular, this effort will increase our attention on domestic violence, which is one of the root causes of the violence on our streets and has been the underlying reason for nearly a quarter of New Orleans homicides this year."
